alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 9:08AM CDT until June 23 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Cherry County in north central Nebraska... * Until 1000 AM CDT. * At 907 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Medicine Lake to 30 miles north of Whitman to 22 miles north of Ashby, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Medicine Lake, Highway 97 crossing the North Loup River, Speckel Meir Lake, Steer Creek Campground, Round Lake, Indian Hill, Whitman Road crossing the North Branch of the Middle Loup River, Schoolhouse Lake, Sevenmile Hill and Intersection of Highway 61 and Survey Valley Road. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 180 and 198. Highway 97 between mile markers 91 and 99. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
